name: Rat-Tifié
description:
Controls:   Arrows to move, A to interact. 

On computer: arrows to move, Alt or Z to interact, Enter for Start.

Name: Rat-Tifié

the game takes place in a sewer

Game type:  die and retry (eg: the binding of Isaac)

Single Player only

Game duration (demo ver): less than 10 minutes

Story and mechanics: You’re a lost rat in the sewer, you need to get a key to get out through a door. But you need to avoid the traps along the way!

Features: hidden achievement (collectible loots).

Made with GB studio

To-do list:

  • music
  • sounds
  • animation
  • debug: actor sprite missing a color
